website_summaries.verdict: You don’t have to be an athlete to appreciate the comfort and healing effects of these acupressure-enhanced recovery sandals.
pros: ACUPOINT foam soles mold to the shape of the feet and are more comfortable than most
Raised triggers stimulate nerve endings to relieve pain in the feet, legs, and lower back
Those suffering from plantar fasciitis find them especially soothing

customer_reviews.title: So noisy.  So uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The molded plastic is very hard, not soft rubber. Cheaply made. Hard plastic bites into the top of the foot. Not flexible around foot. They make a horrible noise with every single step. Like when you run through water and your shoes get slogged then every step after they make a squelchy sound. Or as another reviewer mentioned, similar to a farting noice. I was really excited about these and couldn't have disliked them more. I hate returning things so I really tried to convince myself to find a redeeming g quality in them but I couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy slippers
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and I need to wear shoes indoors. I have tried many indoor slippers in hopes of finding “the one”, but I would end up throwing it out in less than six months. This slipper passed the bending test, which is very important to me. I was told by a podiatrist that if you can bend the shoes, it’s not good for your feet. I like the fact that it’s open toed so I don’t have to wear socks to keep it odor free.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to replace a comfortable pair of crocs that I can no longer get. These are too hard on the bottoms of my feet. I thought that the footbed would be more foamy or spongy feeling, not like hard plastic. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: dempsl

customer_reviews.title: I still really love these. I purchased these due to recent recurrence ...
customer_reviews.text: though a little on the large size (not in terms of length, but of compression around top of foot), I still really love these. I purchased these due to recent recurrence of plantar fasciitis - I wear them after running, and nearly all the time walking in house [I was advised to limit barefoot walking]. These have really helped me, as my plantar fasciitis issues have improved. The cushioning is fantastic - takes a lot of stress off the foot, especially on hard flooring. I wouldn't say the raised nodes on the sole do much (in terms of any kind of massaging of the feet), but I don't particularly care.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wish they would have worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars because it was a too small for my feet. I ordered my exact size which is 12. They rubbed a sore on my little toes and on my big toes. I just can't wear them. They felt great on my feet at first but when it started rubbing my feet so bad I got blisters I couldn't wear them anymore. I wore them for about a week and half and couldn't wear them anymore. I will probably end up giving them to someone else or donating them to a local thrift shop. If it hadn't been for that they would have worked out nicely I think.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Measure you foot do not order by your shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Using the measure of the foot as suggested by the vendor to get the correct size is absolutely key. Do not use your shoe size. I was expecting the inside to be soft and mushy like a foam but it is actually somewhat hard. I am not a runner so I cannot comment on resting the feet after a run but I do have plantar fasciitis and they do feel great to slip in at the end of a long day. I would highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Cottin

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap!! Awful! Don't believe the pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I really feel like a sucker. Do not buy these slip on sandals. Complete rip off. Very cheap product. Seriously, this is quite possibly, the worst product I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Paulie

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T recommend for narrow or reg width foot
customer_reviews.text: Buying shoes online is always question of "will they, won't they fit". I normally wear a 7.5 reg width. These shoes fit ok but plastic on top half of shoe is ridged and run wide at the top. They have a comfortable bottom half. Despite running wide, the foam massage pad keeps my foot from slipping around. Can't recommend this shoe for a narrow or regular width foot.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene H

customer_reviews.title: The podiatrist recommended these so my husband would wear them in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The podiatrist recommended these so my husband would wear them in the house instead of bare feet.to provide some cushioning and arch support. . We just changed from carpet to vinyl plank in the house and we are on slab. They do help with his tendonitis. However they rubbed a sore on one foot so he finds he has to wear socks with them to avoid this happening again So in this way we are less than happy with them. Also, they are less expensive on Amazon than at the store, but the price seems still rather high for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy but TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable that I bought a second pair after having surgery on both feet. I've now switched to a different brand even though it's not as comfortable because wearing shoes that are too big for you is a trip-risk! I always buy the small but I think these are sized for men and not women because even a small is too big and I wear a 7.5 US.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever slippers
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these sandals but in black and small once before. They were too big on my size 8 feet but so comfortable that I could care less how big they looked. They were the most comfortable sandals I ever had. I have had bad feet all my life. Since then I’ve had a problem finding comfortable slippers. So I went ahead and bought extra small with green soles. They fit perfectly and look beautiful and I feel human again. Worth every penny. No one else makes such good slippers. Super lightweight and well constructed and perfect especially if your feet are on the wider side...ample space.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: True to size guide
customer_reviews.text: Overall: purchased a pair for husband, self, father, mother. Pros Lightweight Water resistant Not too hard on bottom of feet Circulation increase is evident Fit true to size: Female us size 8 fit s/m. Female us size 9 fit s/m snugly. Male us size 9 fit s/m. Male us size 10 fit large. Cons Ugly looking Not best for long term wear For very sensitive feet may be a little tough Toes do not come forward enough and leave toe gap
customer_reviews.author: Rick and Ashly

customer_reviews.title: Thank you god for sending me these shoes
customer_reviews.text: If you have plantar facititis The wait is over baby jackpot these are your new friends have been suffering for 17 years with severe for pain honey i put my sandals on and im the queen of the living room lol. Buy these shoes these are your new slippers men women you got to try a pair i cant wait to get a second pair. Sturdy hold real good my feet pronate not in these get out of bed and step on my mini egg crate mattresses 😆
customer_reviews.author: Ms Louisiana

customer_reviews.title: These are great recovery sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are great recovery sandals! I honestly didn't know I needed them until I injured my foot training for a half marathon. It made me realize the importance of good shoes with support. Once I started back with my training, I bought these and now I wear them immediately after my runs. It feels amazing. I used to walk around the house barefoot and now I always slide these on. The support feels great and the bumps make it feel like a mini massage on my tired feet.
customer_reviews.author: ben wahlman

customer_reviews.title: Great plantar sandals for the price, just runs SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good product if you have the specific need for it. I have plantar fasciitis and I have been in pain and my old therapy slippers from croc are like $120. These feel a little more stiff but a little more lightweight and like they do more for me. The only drawbacks are 1) they might hurt you more than help you. Make sure you have tried these around all day and it will help cuz the bumps are HUGE. 2) they are REALLY SMALL. I had to get a XXL. I usually wear L in sandals, ordered up and still had to return and order another size up.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Guy Wong

customer_reviews.title: Relief for PF feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for my boyfriend, who hikes, runs, bikes, and plays basketball. A recent bout with plantar fascitiis has been slowing him down, and while it is mostly better these days, it still flares up after exercise. I read the great reviews about the recovery sandals, and my hunch paid off. He's been wearing them after various activities and says his feet feel great!
customer_reviews.author: ANCO

customer_reviews.title: If You Wear A Half Sized Shoe, Order Smaller
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sandals. I'm dubious of the idea of "recovery sandals", but then again, I don't run anymore. Just hill sprints a few times a month - no more long distance action. Regardless, these feel quite nice on the feet. I'll be interested to see how well they hold up over time. Seem reasonably well constructed though. I wear a size 10.5 in almost everything. FYI - I ordered size 11 - had to return for a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: disgruntled upon occasion

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these sandals for myself and for my son both of us suffer from foot pain at the end of the day. And soon as you put the shoes on you experience relief. My son wore them to school the very next day. He got teased a little because they looked like Crocks but that all stopped as soon as he let them try it on. I wear a size 10 1/2 so I bought a men's large – fit perfectly. He wears a size 7 1/2 so I bought him a men's small – they fit a little large but it's perfect since he's growing. Overall, we couldn't be happier – great sandals
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Ordered my regular size (12) and quite pleased with how they fit and feel when walking
customer_reviews.text: When ordering, I was concerned about the sandals not fitting properly based on some other reviews. Ordered my regular size (12) and quite pleased with how they fit and feel when walking. Very pleased with the overall comfort level. In fact, even in less than a week, my plantar fasciitis symptoms have been reduced significantly. These are my go-to-shoes around the house or around the block!
customer_reviews.author: K. Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: My "Go To" Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These run a tad large (unisex) but are extremely comfortable. They do stay on your foot while walking and the comfort is well worth the price. I wear Bass (men's) flip flops with same style footbed and this is the only comparable sandal I have yet found that I am willing to pay a higher price for simply because they last longer and wear wonderfully on your feet and legs!
customer_reviews.author: SonLitSoul

customer_reviews.title: ... the house for 2 days and they are very comfortable. Not sure if I'll wear them outside because ...
customer_reviews.text: They are wide but I've worn them around the house for 2 days and they are very comfortable. Not sure if I'll wear them outside because I'm not sure that I wouldn't walk out of them. I wear a size7 which is the 6.5-7 X-small size for woman.
customer_reviews.author: Betty G. R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my "go-to" Crocs sandals which have lasted a couple of years, and I am surprised to find that this sandal is more for a narrow to medium width foot than a size 12, 4E with plantar fasciitis. For now, I have to give it a three-star even though they are tight. I will revise my review in a week and then again in a month to see if there are any similarities or improvements.
customer_reviews.author: BIGPAPI99

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ,great fit ,long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I bought for my husband, he loves them and says they are so comfortable and fit perfectly. They hold up really well and I know this because he is not easy on his shoes and he has been having the last pair for a year now . I only got him another pair because I know at some point he will need them .
customer_reviews.author: forever young

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of the sandal and will return this ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing information is too general, and there are not enough individual sizes to chose. Each size shows the fit for several distinct size fits within the range. The range is too large. I like the look of the sandal and will return this pair for the next lower size.
customer_reviews.author: Water Melerose

customer_reviews.title: For some reason I thought the insole was going to ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought the insole was going to be soft. It is not. I don't get the soothing part at all as they are hard as a rock. Again, to be fair that is my perception. Maybe that is what runners are looking for. Well at least with the material they are made of I can keep them by the door and use them if I have to run outside and it is raining.
customer_reviews.author: Happy D

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both own a pair of these and they are the only thing we wear around the house. I suffer from PF off and on and when it's particularly bad, I wear these and it helps a lot. My son had Severs Syndrome when he was in competitive gymnastics and these made a HUGE difference with his pain level. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Sizes not true
customer_reviews.text: I buy men's slides because swelling does not go down on foot that had surgery. Apparently men/women combined size is not as wide as just a man's shoe. I thought if I wore it all day maybe it'd stretch but it didn't so by the time I went to bed I had a very sore and more swollen foot. Because I'd worn them all day I didn't feel I could ask for money back. But the left foot really loved the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie James

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to get comfortable in these sandals but after a day or two wearing them around the house I got used to them. After a couple weeks now they seem to be helping with the chronic gout & diabetic neuropathy in my feet. I have tried several other “cures”, inserts for shoes, other sandals but nothing has help as much as these.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have PF and these slipper are great for my feet , take a little bit of getting used to but worth it , feet do not hurt after wearing these . Well made not cheap. Would like to see them have an arch support model made as well . Would and will buy them again .
customer_reviews.author: Kent Bazan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m about a 9.25 medium (men’s) and chose the 8-9 based on reading reviews. Just arrived and they fit well with my heel about .5 cm from the back. I wanted them for a house slipper to use with socks in the winter and they might be a little tight for that until they break in. Very comfortable and worth the price. Bottom line, if you have wide feet or a high and rigid arch, probably go the larger range of your size, otherwise, the sizing is pretty spot on.
customer_reviews.author: jaysnapp

customer_reviews.title: Good for people with Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 13 shoes and these fit perfectly. Have plantar fasciitis in both feet and just had one operated on. These slippers are comfortable and don’t aggravate my pf. These are my house slippers now. Love them. Once my operated foot is healed, I’ll be sliding around my house in both.
customer_reviews.author: James Cash

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy just too wide.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I developed plantar fasciitis after working on my feet for years. They're super soft and comfy but too wide. I ordered a woman's 9-10 but they're really loose fitting and my feet are on the wider side. The length is fine just too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Tobie C.

customer_reviews.title: Durability is an issue - lasts about 8 months
customer_reviews.text: These are great for about 8 months. Afterwords, the sandals become very uncomfortable as the insoles become uneven from the daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr CK

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller than normal
customer_reviews.text: NIce recovery foot wear , but like others have mentioned they do run a little larger than expected. I wear size 9 running shoes but I find the fit loose and considering I purchased the medium 8-9 size they are not sized very well
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Robidoux

customer_reviews.title: Not Soft or Supportive
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a supportive, ultra soft, comfortable shoes to sooth overworked and achy feet, this is not the shoe for you. They inflexible, the souls are extremely hard and they are completely flat; so, there is no arch support at all. After being on my feet for 16 hours, I wanted something that would give my feet, that are prone to soreness, some relief. These shoes did not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but Small!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I'm a size 9 1/2 W and ordered a large 9 to 9 1/2 men's thinking they would be large like everyone else was saying and they barely fit without socks. Since my feet get cold I usually wear socks so my heel is hanging off about an inch unless I really shove my foot forward. I feel like I'm wearing my wife's shoes! I just ordered another pair in XL and I'll see how that goes. I'll give the smaller ones to my wife!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes! The first pair I got too big but I kept them because my feet swells in the summer. I bought this pair a size down and still they are awesomely comfortable (even w/selledge) I am buying another pair, my feet demanded that I do!
customer_reviews.author: CINQUE

customer_reviews.title: surgeries and ankle reconstructions and it had become painful to walk
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge skeptic but was rather desperate for anything that would help. Have had multiple foot fractures, surgeries and ankle reconstructions and it had become painful to walk. These actually do what they say - relieve pain. I'm impressed and it takes a lot to impress me with things like this. I am a medical professional so by nature a skeptic of things out of the mainstream practice.
customer_reviews.author: SJ from Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. However, the sizes do run small for men. The Medium fit me at a size 6 womens. It is too small for a man's 9. We had to get the Large ones for him. The quality is good and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Use their fitting chart.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes work as expected. I used them as shower shoes at the gym until March 2020, and will us them again once the gyms reopen. Just be care when purchasing. I purchased a large and wear 11 -12 US size running shoes and have narrow feet. My feet fit perfectly, but I had expected them to be a little larger. The 'therapeutic' soles takes some getting used to with my low arches. They feel extra prickly after a hard workout which may be good for your feet, but doesn't necessarily feel great at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable 12-13 fits me as a 12
customer_reviews.text: The 12-13 fits great. Perfect for everything but formal attire. No smells, no rubbing on my feet. The uneven footbed does seem to help. I am not a runner, but I have knee and foot pain from decades of martial arts training. These are great for me. Might be too small for a 13.
customer_reviews.author: Howlinfido

customer_reviews.title: Dont  trust sticker size.
customer_reviews.text: These were excellent, I wore them out after 2 or three years. Re-orderd exact same size. They sent me pair with little sticky sticker stuck to bottom of sole, stating it was XXL. The molded sole said it was a lg. Guess they thought I wouldnt notice. Then they expect me to make the trip to store to return, for their mistake!
customer_reviews.author: St Wix Madison

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I could've ordered a size DOWN. I think I've got the biggest feet in the world so I ordered the biggest size they had mens 12-13 (2XXL) A size lower would've been perfect, but I'm also allowing for foot swellage. and these feel really nice. they are so lightweight too. I will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: CINQUE

customer_reviews.title: Great for post running event wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable once you get used to the stiffness - which is a good thing. If you're looking for comfy slippers, probably not for you. But if you want post run recovery and wear around, to me these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chick

customer_reviews.title: Massage
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair best sandals ever. they really work for me massage my feet put them on when I’m home after run or workout and wear them around the house Old pair I take to the beach and when I go to Florida for the winter to knock around it
customer_reviews.author: joep

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: They are OK but no where as comfortable and Adidas. I'll probably wear them occasionally but will probably toss them. They are taking up room in my closet better suited to other things.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Bestic

customer_reviews.title: My wife is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my wife, who spends lots of time on her fit during the day. She goes for the slippers as soon as she gets home, and describes them as very comfortable and soothing, plus very light. Definitely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: They look big on my feet, though fit well enough(they don't fly off my feet or anything). Comfy, particularly when wearing socks. I mistakenly bought a pair with a green footbed, not thinking of the dirt that can gather. I'm going to order another pair a size smaller and a darker footbed
customer_reviews.author: JasonB.

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy and slip resistant too
customer_reviews.text: So comfy; read the reviews and notes so i got the perfect size; they're comfy and the soles give your feet a massage when you wear them; water and slip resistant so they stay right by the door for quick outdoor trips. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: DDG115

customer_reviews.title: Agitiating and Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and uncomfortable at the same time. The bottoms are comfortable but the plastic top rubs against my pinkie toe and hurts after a few minutes. Also the soles make farting noises when walking. It's funny for a minute but then it's just agitating. They feel great and don't make any noise if I happen to be wearing socks...but I typically don't wear socks with sandals. Just my two cents but I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo A. R. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Relief for your feet
customer_reviews.text: I run a lot and the first thing I do after I run is to get out of my running shoes, these were perfect for that! They were cushioned enough and just give your feet lots of relief!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, not in length, but in body of sandal
customer_reviews.text: I went down 2 sizes. Not for length, but for the part you slide your foot into. They were so "baggy" I couldn't keep my regular size on when walking. I'm just a run-of-the-mill foot size and width, almost every shoe I try on fits correct. But the smaller size in these fits best and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TBS

customer_reviews.title: very light
customer_reviews.text: wanted these to work so bad - loved the coloring, liked because they were lightweight - but they just didn't work for me. Couldn't give a 5 star - but there is nothing wrong with the shoe - there is nothing there to hurt - it is MY feet!!
customer_reviews.author: CLawson

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just got these 2 days ago.... most comfortable w/ socks on. Feet get sweaty w/o socks. I have arthritis in several areas on both feet and these are comfortable...not sure if they're better than the Adissage slides by Adidas, but at least the little nubs don't break off....Will have to see if I feel the same in the summer....would rather wear them barefoot....
customer_reviews.author: AA Roma

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit on the large size for me but I kept them because I needed them for recovery after my marathon. Even though they are a bit large, I really don't care at this point because I wear them all the time to yoga class and around the house when I don't want to wear hot slippers. Great sandals and I would definitely recommend them as they are very comfortable and easy on your feet!
customer_reviews.author: mindfulshopper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stimulating
customer_reviews.text: I love these for 30 min walks or shorter. I could probably wear them longer, but choose not to. They were odd for the first few mins, but I found myself really enjoying the stimulation as I continued to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Top Band too big
customer_reviews.text: The insole is amazing. Band that goes over my instep/ top of my foot is too big. Used sizing chart. Measured my feet in inches and the soles fit perfectly. The top is way too big and my foot slides so far forward my toes touch the floor. Socks help a little in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: laceyj

customer_reviews.title: Relief for Atheletic Feet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for sole relief after long distance hiking primarily. These sandals are lightweight and comfortable. I wear a W7 (XS in this shoe) and they fit, although they are a little long and slightly loose. Fortunately my high arches help take up some of the slack. Certainly recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: kee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and relaxing on my flat feet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would be a little on the small size and ordered the next size up. They are a little big for me. (I chose to keep them than risk an exchange and find out the next smaller size was a little small. I still love the feel and wear them around the house after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. From PA

customer_reviews.title: Happiness for my feet!
customer_reviews.text: From the instant I put these on I new these were sandals for me. My plantar fasciitis is unbearable after a long day of wearing dress shoes for work. The first thing I do is take those bad boys off an put these on.I wish they made men's dress shoes that feel this good!
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Nice built but too long.
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of the sandal is great. It suggests going up a size but they were way too long. I wear an 8.5 so I went with a 9. I doubt an 8 would of even fit. They were very easy to work with to return thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Order one size up.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall product but was really frustrated that they’re at least one size too small, I know it’s just the way shoes fit sometimes
customer_reviews.author: JACK SMYTHE

customer_reviews.title: Second pair, not so impressed
customer_reviews.text: The bumpy insoles on these new ones just aren't as good as the old ones. Something has changed, and it's not for the better. Sorry, I will buy another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: supreme comfort
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking in a shoe for in house wear. Great support and help for foot issues. Comfort all day, no pain or discomfort with foot massage. Highly recommend for aching feet and lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: bookish

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: THE SIZE IS ATLEAST 1/2 INCH SHORTER THEN THE ORIGINAL PAIR I PURCHASED FROM THE SAME PEOPLE. CUTING CORNERS AGAIN IS PRIMARY OR ALL THESE COMPANIES SO THAT THEY CAN MAKE MOORE MONEY. NOT HAPPY AND I WILL NOT PURHASE THESE AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: LOUIS J PILLER JR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but size is off
customer_reviews.text: the size on the bottom says 5-8... who ever thought to make a shoe fit 3 sizes? I am a size 8 women’s and I found the shoe too big.. not sure if I will keep them the color is funky fun and the comfort is amazing... but the size is bizarre
customer_reviews.author: Mary Allen

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with putting too much weight on my heels. These sandals help my feet recover after a long day. The padding is perfect, unlike Under Armour's 4D-foam sandals, I feel like this will last at least a year or more.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not for those seeking relief from PF
customer_reviews.text: No arch support. I was hoping these would help with my PF, but they were a big disappointment. After giving them a chance of walking around in them all day, my feet didn't hurt any worse than they did before, but neither did they feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Schumm

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big but nice.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the first pair back, I wear a womans 9-9.5 so I ordered a medium, way way big, returned them for a small and they fit, but even still the top of the shoe is very roomy. I like to run and walk a lot, these do feel very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques7

customer_reviews.title: Good for Plantar Faciities
customer_reviews.text: This show was recommended to me after a diagnosis of plantar faciaiitis. Although my preference is to walk barefoot when I can, the injury made that painful. These shoes are a really good alternative. They provide good padding for my sore heel and a sort of constant massage for my feet. They're comfortable and easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: isabelle kirshner

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these sandals in hopes they would be comfortable (post run/ workout)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals in hopes they would be comfortable (post run/ workout), boy was I glad I did! Super comfortable. They are now my go to footwear I wear all over my home! I need to get another pair in time for summer. Great purchase for me...
customer_reviews.author: B Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals but a little narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I recently had 2 knee replacement surgeries. These sandals are very comfortable, but need some stretching. I have wide feet and probably should've ordered a size larger. Definitely helping me walk as I rehab my knees.
customer_reviews.author: RG Slapshot

customer_reviews.title: Soothe tired feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband has pain in the ball of his foot every day after being on his feet all day. He wears these as slippers in the house and they really seem to help!
customer_reviews.author: 4muffins

customer_reviews.title: Need a high arch for these to fit properly! ...
customer_reviews.text: Need a high arch for these to fit properly! The top strap is too high so your foot will move too far forward and your toes will hang off the edge!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 shoe but that size was too small, so I exchanged them for the next size up and no problems. Very comfortable , Ive been a runner for over 40 years and have tried every slider made. So far, these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: colnmeg

customer_reviews.title: PR sole’s are great
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both love the pr soles he wear them after runs and keep them on.we both wear them all day at home.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great Slides
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Great after a run and a good all around slide. Easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability.  Already tearing.
customer_reviews.text: I only wear them around the house but they are already tearing. Going to have to throw them out. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. I love how the design bottom massages your feet while you're walking. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Avila

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair for hubby...this one is SECOND pair for me. These are just..priceless!. Have one pair I use inside, this recent purchase is for outside. Out of the box comfy. They just make your feet happy!!
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers for my feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers and Are my third pair!! I wear them all the time. Very comfortable and I don’t have to worry about my troublesome feet!!
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and feel supportive  when I walk around the house in them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear them as slippers in the house. I’ve had issues with my feet and I think it’s related to walking barefoot on hardwood floors. They are very comfortable and feel supportive on my feet. I had read a review that they were stiff and noisy so I was concerned but today they came I put them on and that was not the case for me. The only bad thing is that they’re not very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Curdes

customer_reviews.title: WAY WAY TOO WIDE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the size 12. I have a wide foot, and often can't fit into new shoes, especially dress shoes. These were TOO WIDE for me! It's hard to keep them on my feet. If you have extra extra wide feet, you've found your sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Tom - Central CA

customer_reviews.title: Can't find real good bumpy bottom sandals any more but these will do
customer_reviews.text: Can't find real good bumpy bottom sandals any more but these will do. They don't rub any where and that's a good thing. The soles are of that sort of dry hardish foam stuff. The points aren't firm at all. You feel them but that's about all.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: long time knee pain completely went away
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I had smashed my toe and was having trouble walking. They helped almost immediately. I also have had knee pain for a long time which also completely went away, an unexpected but added bonus I now use them when I do aerobic exercise because they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Essa

customer_reviews.title: ... soles take a little getting used to but it's pretty comfortable once you wear it often
customer_reviews.text: The soles take a little getting used to but it's pretty comfortable once you wear it often. Might have to pace yourself starting out as your feet may not be used to the molded bumpy surface.
customer_reviews.author: Bahamude

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of 5K races and these sandals are wonderful, I wear in indoors and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Saliema

customer_reviews.title: SIZE INCORRECT TWICE
customer_reviews.text: The product itself desderves a 5-star rating, but the website description is very poor. I've ordered this product twice. I actually love the product, but the website give sizes numerically instead of S, M, L, etc. I've had to return them twice because I couldn't figure out what "L" was based on the numbers. VEry annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with these sandals. A bit pricey, at par with the big name brands in price tag but quality wise, these exceed in comparison. I have owned these sandals for almost over an year, and today I am buying them again so wanted to give these sandals a long due credit!
customer_reviews.author: A. Varma

customer_reviews.title: These sandals help my plantar fascitis but are huge on ...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals help my plantar fascitis but are huge on my feet. They should not say that they fit both men and women, these are clearly a men's size only. I just wear them around the house since they are so big.
customer_reviews.author: SKKONLINE

customer_reviews.title: fits small
customer_reviews.text: make sure you get a larger size than your foot size it fits about one size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rich

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed with sizing
customer_reviews.text: These run huge on my feet but too hard for me to return them. I wear them to go out watering in the yard and that's about it. Maybe they'd fit a man better but the sizing was off for a female. I was torn how to rate the arch support - not great but better than most.
customer_reviews.author: Faeriegrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son for after cross country meets. He loves them! Like a pillow for his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Clark

customer_reviews.title: They seem to run a little large and don’t seem to help at all with plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because the reviews said that they helped with plantar fasciitis. I have not experienced any change.
customer_reviews.author: Seal Man

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I took them for vacation and was walking in them on the beach and around the island. Nice quality, stylish look, and good padding.
customer_reviews.author: NetCostComputers.com

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to fitting correctly also very stiff unclear how these can be useful during recovery.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. No support and too wide. I contacted them to ask for a refund......crickets......very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Slips!
customer_reviews.text: Great slips and very comfortable. As always, I order the next size larger as slips tend to run smaller than I like. They also fit better in winter when I wear socks to keep my feet warm and want something I can slip into and out of quickly. I will be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Erv Crain

customer_reviews.title: Just enough...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I finally got these sandals. The density is just enough to give the massage but not too much to make you feel like you're walking on cobblestones. I enjoy wearing these!
customer_reviews.author: avroomer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable slides I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Love these, had a pair for over 2 years. Bought a pair for my wife. Super comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

product_meta.title: PR Soles Original Sandals | Foot Massaging & Recovery Footwear | Mens & Womens Original Slides | Multiple Sizes & Colors
feature_bullets: PLEASE REFER TO THE SIZE CHART IMAGE TO FIND THE BEST FIT

RECOVER FASTER! PR SOLES are specifically designed to provide athletes the most comfortable pre and post workout footwear to promote the recovery of sore and tired feet. Also great for anyone who spends a lot of time on their feet. Significantly reduce your recovery time by wearing PR SOLES and make your body feel all around better.

ACUPOINT (Patent Pending): Our proprietary design features ACUPOINT (Patent Pending) soles, a comfortable and durable foam cushion that conforms to the shape of your foot, allowing for maximum comfort and recovery. ACUPOINT (Patent Pending) soles activate nerve endings in the foot, which in turn massage the feet, improve circulation, and break up painful lactic and uric acid that accumulates in your feet over time. Our PR Soles do not provide arch support.

PAMPER YOUR FEET! PR SOLES are proven to alleviate foot, leg, and lower back pain by stimulating nerves and sending healing relief throughout your entire body! Designed with lightweight, breathable material, easily slip on PR SOLES after a long run, a hard day at work or just to lounge around the house to relieve tension and swelling of the feet for constant, all-day comfort.

SIZING: PR SOLES Recovery Sandals are designed to be the most comfortable post-run recovery footwear. The wider foot bed and roomy instep allow your foot to breath comfortably and will accommodate swollen feet after long runs. For the best fit, we recommend that you measure your foot and compare that number to the foot bed length in the images. If you are in between sizes, please order the larger size. OUR PR SOLES DO NOT PROVIDE ARCH SUPPORT.

DESIGNED AND SOLD BY Gone For a Run – A USA based, family owned and operated business located in Connecticut. We pride ourselves on the integrity and quality of our products and firmly stand behind all that we sell. If you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase, please contact us so we can make it right.
